column1: The  following  document provides  a synthesis  of  the  most  recent  August 2025  international
visitor  arrivals  data sourced  from  the  Department  of  Immigration  &  Emigration.  The  data  is
current  as  of  31st August  2025,  and  subject  to  change.  The  data  provides  an  overview  of
month-on-month and annual changes in visitor arrivals to Sri Lanka from international source
markets. The data is meant to provide an overview of how travel and tourism is performing to
